info.name: Alchemist Artificer Archetype, Modified for Almir

description.p: An Alchemist is an expert at combining reagents to produce mystical effects. Alchemists use their creations to give life and to leech it away. Alchemy is the oldest of artificer traditions, and its versatility has long been valued during times of war and peace.

Beginning at 3rd level, whenever you finish a long rest, you can magically produce experimental elixirs in empty flasks you touch. You choose the effect of the experimental elixir when someone drinks the elixir. As a bonus action, a creature can drink the elixir, or as an action, a creature can administer it to another creature.

You make a number of elixirs equal to your proficiency bonus. Creating an experimental elixir requires you to have alchemist supplies on your person, and any elixir you create with this feature lasts until it is drunk or until the end of your next long rest.
The effects of the elixir improve when you reach certain levels in this class, once at 6th level and again at 15th level.

tr.td: Healing. The drinker regains a number of hit points equal to 2d4 + your Intelligence modifier. The amount of hit points regained increases by 1d4 at 6th level and again at 15th level.
Swiftness. The drinker's walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour. This speed bonus increases by 5 feet at 6th level and again at 15th level.
Resilience. The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes. The duration increases to 1 hour at 6th level and 8 hours at 15th level.

Boldness. The drinker can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to every attack roll and saving throw they make for the next minute. The duration increases to 10 minutes at 6th level and 1 hour at 15th level.
Flight. The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes. The flying speed becomes equal to your walking speed at 6th level and becomes 60 feet at 15th level.

Transformation. The drinker's body is transformed as if by the alter self spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last for 10 minutes. The effects of the spell last for 1 hour at 6th level, and is cast as if at 5th level at 15th level.

description.p: Also at 3rd level, you always have a handful of extra tools on hand to aid you in combat.

As an action, you can create a flask of alchemist's fire, a vial of acid, flash grenade, or smoke grenade using your alchemist tools. You may throw it as a part of the same action, and if the item forces a saving throw, you can choose to have it use your spell save DC instead of its own. The item becomes inert if you do not use it within an hour. Starting at 9th level, you can produce a bomb or glue bomb with this ability.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

You can create a flask of alchemist's fire, a vial of acid, flash bomb, smoke bomb, glue bomb, or fire bomb with your alchemist tools. You may throw it as a part of the same action, and if the item forces a saving throw, the DC is {{artificer:spellcasting:dc}}. The item becomes inert if you do not use it with an hour.

description.p: As an action, a character can throw a flash grenade at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes in a brilliant flash of light. Creatures within 20 feet of the point of impact must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution Saving Throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn. The explosion does not spread around corners, so creatures behind full cover automatically succeed on the saving throw.

This unique explosive can be primed and thrown up to 30 feet as an action, exploding on impact. Creatures within 20 feet of it must make a DC 12 Dexterity Saving Throw or be restrained for 1 minute. A restrained creature can make a DC 12 Strength check as an action, escaping on a success.
